roleset.name: intuit, know as if by divine inspiration

example.name: divine-v
example.text: -LRB- His conclusion may have been based on the fake mobile biolab plans foisted upon the US by the Chalabi associate " Curveball " , which Alibek divined *T* to be identical to Russian mobile lab design -RRB- .
example.arg: *T* to be identical to Russian mobile lab design

roleset.note: DIVINE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
